page.title: 14Games Children Play
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY:in school-netball NETBALL began in England as basketball in America.In netball there are seven players and in basketball only five.The object of the game is to get as many goals through a net on a post by not fouling or cheating.The main passes you use are a bounce pass,chest pass and overarm pass.The bounce pass is used when all your team players are marked so you do a small bounce to carry on with the play.A similar pass is the underpass,a throw without bouncing.The chest pass is when you throw to a player chest to chest.The overarm pass is when you throw over the opponents' heads to get to your own team player.To score you shoot through a ring in a post without moving your feet. (Miranda)
